name: ShapeFactsforKids
0:
”Alexa, open shape facts”
”Alexa, open shape facts and tell me a shape fact”
”Alexa, open shape facts and tell me a cool fact”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: shape facts
des: Your child will learn more about different shapes with Alexa. Ask her to open Shape Facts and she will tell them about a fun shape fact. Shape Facts for Kids provides helpful information to children learning the basics of shapes. It will also expand their knowledge by introducing new terms and other types of shapes. For example, "A nonagon has nine sides"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
